data.comment: The match has started, with Luton kicking-off.
James Collins is on target to give Luton a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 29, James Collins puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
It's Preston with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Daniel Johnson is replacing Ryan Ledson for Preston at Kenilworth Road.
Jordan Storey is replacing Paul Huntington for the away team.
The away team replace Jayden Stockley with Emil Riis Jakobsen.
In the minute 58, Alex Neil (Preston) is making a fifth substitution, with Sean Maguire replacing Tom Barkhuizen.
Alex Neil is making the team's sixth substitution at Kenilworth Road with Tom Bayliss replacing Brad Potts.
Goal! Luton extend their lead to 3-0 through James Collins.
In the minute 75, The home team have replaced George Moncur with Rhys Norrington-Davies. This is the first substitution made today by Nathan Jones.
Jordan Clark is replacing Harry Cornick for Luton at Kenilworth Road.
Luton make their third substitution with Luke Berry replacing Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall.
In the minute 80, Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a fourth substitution, with Ryan Tunnicliffe replacing Ruddock Pelly.
The home team have replaced James Collins with Sam Nombe. This is the fifth substitution made today by Nathan Jones.
